ActJudges Act
SubjectJeanne H. Oliver ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Herbert A.D. Oliver
PrecisGranting of an annuity to JEANNE H. OLIVER, widow of the Hon. Herbert A.D. Oliver, Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective January 15, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
